title: USCF's Love Sees Oil Glut Likely To Persist in Near Term(Audio)
itunes:title: USCF's Love Sees Oil Glut Likely To Persist in Near Term(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: John Love, President & CEO of USCF (United States Commodities Fund), with an outlook for oil and commodities, and their offering of oil ETFs.
